welcome.title: Software Developer
welcome.introduction: Professional experience in designing, implementing, and maintaining web solutions using mainly technologies such as **Java, React, NodeJS and .NET**.

experience.title: Experience
ensolvers: Contributed to the integrations team within the company's largest project.
Developed strategic integrations with platforms such as **Shopify**, **Stripe**, and **Twitter**.
Actively participated in the interview processes to onboard new talents.
Provided initial training and ongoing support to new team members.

queuety.description: Web application that enables **managing YouTube video playback** on a computer through one or multiple mobile devices, **without the need to be connected to the same Wi-Fi network**.
queuety.l1: Light/Dark theme and dynamic configuration of font size and type.
queuety.l4: Remote control of volume and fullscreen.

biux.description: My partner and I developed this app as the final project for a UX-related course. The main focus is on **accessibility**; it was analyzed through different web validators to ensure the correct use of tags, colors, aria attributes, keyboard navigation, and screen reader usage.
biux.l1: Light/Dark Theme and dynamic configuration of colors, typography, and sizes.
biux.l2: Comprehensive management of cycling courses and routines, with particular tracking for each student.
biux.l3: Focus on providing a good user experience on every interface.

screenOps.description: Application for comprehensive management of cinema operations. Allows administrators to manage cinemas, rooms, movies, users, showtimes, create seat layouts for rooms, and handle ticket sales.
screenOps.l2: Focused on scalability and separation of concerns,
